cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 550 miles SSE of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across the central Gulf, then turning north-northwest and accelerating toward the central Louisiana coast Friday

weather_observation.watch_coast: San Luis Pass to west of High Island, TX
weather_observation.warning_coast: High Island, TX to Grand Isle, LA (hurricane watch area east of the port)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: upper Texas coast east of Port O’Connor through Louisiana and Mississippi coasts
weather_observation.wind: Occasional tropical-storm-force gusts (35-45 mph) possible Friday as outer bands brush the upper Texas coast.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–3 ft inundation possible between Port O’Connor and High Island, including the Freeport area.
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain in outer bands Friday–Friday night; localized higher totals possible but generally below 4 inches.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents beginning Thursday; low but non-zero risk of brief tornadoes in outer rainbands Friday.
